title: [Health] Previous natural infection with SARS-CoV-2 was associated with lower incidence of SARS-CoV-2 infection, regardless of the variant, and showed little waning of protection compared to the primary 2 dose mRNA Vaccination. However, Vaccination remains the safest tool for acquiring protection.
[Medicine] Interesting summary of human health in space. Space exploration carries with it a great deal of risk from both known (e.g., ionizing radiation, microgravity) and unknown risk factors.
